document.full_text: philips will unveil what it says is the world's first led standard-type light bulb capable of producing light equivalent to that of a 75-watt bulb.
document.title: philips brightens its led lineup
lines_and_colors: philips will unveil what it says is the world's first led standard-type light bulb capable of producing light equivalent to that of a 75-watt bulb.
